mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectLgsDlv Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ORD_NO , DLV_PCUPSP_TURN , DLV_TURN , CLM_NO , DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , OVSEA_DLV_DMSTC_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , ZONE_TURN , GOD_MIN_WT , DLV_CHRGE_HIST_TURN , DLV_CST_BND_MBD_CD , DLV_MN_CD , DLV_COM_CD , DLV_COM_NM , GDGP_STAT_CD , DMSTC_WAYBIL_NO , DMSTC_WAYBIL_NO_REG_DT , HBL_NO , HBL_NO_REG_DT , OVSEA_WAYBIL_NO , OVSEA_WAYBIL_NO_REG_DT , CVNSTOR_HDRY_APRV_NO , CRNCY_CD , EXCHG_RT_APL_BEG_DT , STDR_CRNCY_AMT , PAY_EXCHG_RT_CRNCY_AMT , REALITY_DLV_CST , PLC_DLV_CST , CNCL_DLV_CST , RTGOD_DLV_CST , EXCHG_DLV_CST , DLV_CST_CPN_DC_AMT , DLV_CST_CPN_NO , DLV_CST_CPN_PRM_NO , DLIVY_WAYBIL_NO_ERP_TRNSMIS_CD , DLIVY_WAYBIL_NO_ERP_TRNSMIS_ER , DLIVY_WAYBIL_NO_ERP_TRNSMIS_DT , WAYBIL_NO_ERP_TRNSMIS_CD , WAYBIL_NO_ERP_TRNSMIS_ERR_CONT , WAYBIL_NO_ERP_TRNSMIS_DT , DLV_COM_TRNSMIS_TGT_YN , DLV_COM_TRNSMIS_YN , DLV_COM_TRNSMIS_DT , DLV_COM_DLV_COMPT_DT , SHOP_PKUP_SMS_SND_YN , MAIL_SND_YN , CAL_DT , DRTDR_NONGDGP_RESN_CD , DRTDR_NONDLVR_RESN_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT , ORD_CNFIRM_YN FROM LGS_DLV WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DLV_PCUPSP_TURN = #{dlvPcupspTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND DLV_TURN = #{dlvTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
